meanings.definition: Not having the quality of sticking to surfaces.
meanings.sent1: The nonsticky tape easily peeled off the paper.
meanings.sent2: The nonsticky lotion made it easy to slide the ring off my finger.
meanings.sent3: I tried to make a nonsticky sandwich by using oil instead of butter.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsticky personality allowed her to adapt to any situation smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The nonsticky coating on the pan prevented the food from burning.

meanings.definition: Not causing things to stick together.
meanings.sent1: The nonsticky glue didn't hold the pieces together.
meanings.sent2: The nonsticky labels came off easily without leaving residue.
meanings.sent3: He tried to build a nonsticky tower of cards, but it kept falling apart.
meanings.sent4: Their nonsticky relationship allowed them to maintain their independence.
meanings.sent5: The nonsticky tape kept the pages separate without tearing them.

meanings.sent1: The nonsticky candy melted in my mouth without leaving a residue.
meanings.sent2: The nonsticky hands easily brushed off the sand.
meanings.sent3: She preferred nonsticky lip balm that didn't feel heavy.
meanings.sent4: The nonsticky snowflakes gently fell on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The nonsticky surface of the table made it easy to clean.
